response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und missbrauchen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and misuse our personal data? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and misusing personal data, and questions why this is still happening despite the importance of data privacy and security. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics.
